text: Kenneth Clark Moore (December 1, 1943 - May 4, 2022) was an American athlete and journalist. Moore was a two time Olympian. He ran both the 1968 Mexico City and 1972 Munich Olympic marathon, finishing fourth in 1972. Moore died on May 4, 2022, in Kailua, Hawaii at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American long-distance runners Category:Sportspeople from Portland, Oregon Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Journalists from Oregon Category:Writers from Portland, Oregon
title: Kenny Moore
